0P000147L6.F.long_name: Pramerica Global High Yield Euro Hedged
0P000147L6.F.manager_bio: Robert Cignarella, CFA, is a Managing Director and Head of PGIM Fixed Income's Leveraged Finance Team, which includes the US and European High Yield Bond and Bank Loan sector teams. Mr. Cignarella is also the co-Head of the Global High Yield Strategy. Prior to joining the firm in 2014, Mr. Cignarella was a managing director and co-head of high yield and bank loans at Goldman Sachs Asset Management. He also held positions as a high yield portfolio manager and a high yield and investment grade credit analyst. Earlier, he was a financial analyst in the investment banking division of Salomon Brothers. Mr. Cignarella received an MBA from the University of Chicago, and a bachelorâs degree in operations research and industrial engineering from Cornell University. He holds the Chartered Financial Analyst (CFA) designation.
0P000147L6.F.summary:

Fino al 20/10/2023 (Orizzonte Temporale di Investimento)

0P00016FXE.F.manager_bio:
MR. GOETTMANN HAS 14 YEARS OF EXPERIENCE IN ASSET MANAGEMENT IN EUROPE, IN ASIA
AND IN THE US. MR. GOETTMANN HAS DEVELOPED A STRONG EXPERTISE IN MANAGER
SELECTION AND IN BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT.
MR. GOETTMANN BEGAN HIS CAREER AT SOCIÃTÃ GÃNÃRALE ASSET MANAGEMENT IN
SINGAPORE WHERE HE CONTRIBUTED TO THE LOCAL SUBSIDIARYâS DEVELOPMENT. HE WAS IN
CHARGE OF FUND CREATION AND MARKETING FOR INSTITUTIONS UNTIL JULY 1998. THEN HE
JOINED HFR GROUP IN CHICAGO WHERE HE WAS RESPONSIBLE FOR THE SELECTION AND SALE
OF SPECIALISED HEDGE FUNDS.
IN 2000, HE CAME BACK TO FRANCE AND JOINED DEXIA ASSET MANAGEMENT AS A HEAD OF
ALTERNATIVE INVESTMENT SALES FOR EUROPE (EX-FRANCE).
PRIOR TO CO-FOUNDING ANAXIS IN 2003 MR. GOETTMANN WAS A PARTNER AT FINALTIS, THE
FRENCH SUBSIDIARY OF ROBECO SPECIALISED IN MANAGING FRENCH REGULATED FUNDS OF
HEDGE FUNDS.MR. GOETTMANN WAS INVOLVED IN MANAGER SELECTION AND FUND RAISING.
MR. GOETTMANN GRADUATED FROM THE BUSINESS SCHOOL OF ROUEN (HEAD OF THE DEANâS
LIST) IN 1994. HE ALSO OBTAINED A MASTER DEGREE IN CORPORATE FINANCE AND HE IS A
CHARTERED FINANCIAL ANALYST (CFA).
